arStrings.szText: {c_important}Evading{/c} through an enemy infected by {c_important}Shadow Imbuement{/c} grants {c_important}{u}Stealth{/u}{/c} for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds. Breaking {c_important}{u}Stealth{/u}{/c} with an attack grants you {c_random}[Affix_Value_1*100|%|]{/c} Maximum Life on Kill for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c} seconds.
